selects.select: SELECT ProjectNO as 工程代码, projectname as 工程名称, address as 工程地址, category as 工程性质, stru as 结构类型, projectCategory as 工程类别, high as 高度, floors1 as 地上层数, floors2 as 地下层数, area1 as 建筑面积, area2 as 用地面积, ydpzcode as 工程用地批准书号, ydxkcode as 用地规划许可证号, ghcode as 规划许可证号, sgcode as 工程施工许可证号, price1 as 工程预算, price2 as 工程决算, begindate as 开工日期, bjdate as 报建日期, enddate as 竣工日期, hjqk as 获奖情况, zzmj as 住宅面积, bgyfmj as 办公用房面积, syyfmj as 商业用房面积, cfmj as 厂房面积, dxsmj as 地下室面积, qtyfmj as 其他用房面积, ts1 as 防火等级, ts2 as 工程质量, ts3 as 项目经理, ts4 as 大户型套数, tstotal as 总套数, zygz as 专业工长, zjy as 项目专业质量检验员, sgbzz as 施工班组长, tbr as 填表人, jsdwshr as 建设单位提交人, jldwshr as 监理单位提交人, createdate as 填表时间 FROM [T_Projects] WHERE [T_Projects].[ProjectNO] = #ProjectNO#

Select a.ProjectNO as 工程代码, a.projectname as 工程名称, a.address as 工程地址, a.category as 工程性质, a.projecttype as 工程类别, a.ydpzcode as 工程用地批准书号, a.ydxkcode as 用地规划许可证号, a.ghcode as 规划许可证号, a.sgcode as 工程施工许可证号, a.begindate as 开工日期, a.bjdate as 报建日期, a.enddate as 竣工日期, a.zygz as 专业工长, a.zjy as 项目专业质量检验员, a.sgbzz as 施工班组长, b.GCYS as 工程预算, b.GCJS as 工程结算, b.HZ as 荷载, b.StuructType as 构造类型, [b.Level] as 等级, b.Longs as 长度, [b.Width] as 宽度, b.KJ as 跨径, b.JK as 净空, [b.Remark] as 备注 from t_projects as a,T_Project_Brige as b where a.projectNo=b.ProjectID and a.ProjectNo=#ProjectNO#

Select a.ProjectNO as 工程代码, a.projectname as 工程名称, [a.address] as 工程地址, a.category as 工程性质, a.projecttype as 工程类别, a.ydpzcode as 工程用地批准书号, a.ydxkcode as 用地规划许可证号, a.ghcode as 规划许可证号, a.sgcode as 工程施工许可证号, a.begindate as 开工日期, a.bjdate as 报建日期, a.enddate as 竣工日期, a.zygz as 专业工长, a.zjy as 项目专业质量检验员, a.sgbzz as 施工班组长, b.GCYS as 工程预算, [b.Remark] as 备注 from t_projects as a,T_Project_RoadLamp as b where a.projectNo=b.ProjectID and a.ProjectNo=#ProjectNO#

Select a.ProjectNO as 工程代码, a.projectname as 工程名称, a.address as 工程地址, a.category as 工程性质, a.projecttype as 工程类别, a.ydpzcode as 工程用地批准书号, a.ydxkcode as 用地规划许可证号, a.ghcode as 规划许可证号, a.sgcode as 工程施工许可证号, a.begindate as 开工日期, a.bjdate as 报建日期, a.enddate as 竣工日期, a.zygz as 专业工长, a.zjy as 项目专业质量检验员, a.sgbzz as 施工班组长, b.ID, b.STARTX as 工程起点, b.STARTY as 工程止点, b.ENDX as 起点坐标, b.ENDY as 终点坐标, b.GCYS as 工程预算, b.GCJS as 工程结算, b.Road_Level as 道路级别, b.LongCount as 道路总长度, [b.Width] as 宽度, b.HZ as 荷载, b.ProjectID as 项目编号, [b.Remark] as 备注 from t_projects as a,T_Traffic as b where a.projectNo=b.ProjectID and a.ProjectNo=#ProjectNO#
